sourcesContent:
<template>
    <router-link :to="link" id="link">{{ text }}</router-link>
    
</template>

<script>
    export default{
        name: 'LinkButton',
        props: {
            text: String,
            link: String,
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>
    #link:hover{
        background-color: rgb(61, 158, 223);
    }
    #link{
        display: flex;
        margin: 0px;
        height: 100%;
        background-color: rgb(14, 111, 175);
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        padding: auto 2;
        transition: all 200ms;
        text-decoration: none ;
        color: white;
        margin: auto 20px;
        font-family: "Roboto Condensed";
        font-size: 17px;
    }
</style>
